languages.text: {n}Увы, среди охраны трудовых лагерей было мало владеющих книжной премудростью людей. Большинство "неправильных" заключенных просто забили до смерти на допросах. Но один надзиратель, наделенный художественным даром, кое-что заметил.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, среди охраны трудовых лагерей было мало владеющих книжной премудростью людей. Большинство "неправильных" заключенных просто забили до смерти на допросах. Но один надзиратель, наделенный художественным даром, кое-что заметил.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who have possessed some sort of academic wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during the interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for artistry, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who have possessed some sort of academic wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during the interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for artistry, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, there were not many labour camp wardens who possessed some sort of learned wisdom — most of the 'strange' prisoners have been simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the wardens, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

{n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，劳改营的大部分监察员都没有什么探究精神，绝大多数行迹古怪的囚犯在审讯期间被活活打死。不过，某位颇具审讯艺术天赋的监察员确实注意到了某些不同寻常东西。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，劳改营的大部分监察员都没有什么探究精神，绝大多数行迹古怪的囚犯在审讯期间被活活打死。不过，某位颇具审讯艺术天赋的监察员确实注意到了某些不同寻常东西。{/n}
{n}遗憾的是，劳改营的大部分监察员没什么脑子，绝大多数“行迹古怪”的囚犯在审讯期间被活活打死。不过，某位颇具审讯艺术天赋的监察员确实注意到了某些东西。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, los supervisores no contaban con la sutileza necesaria para un interrogatorio eficaz. En lugar de eso, la mayoría de los extraños prisioneros acabaron apaleados hasta la muerte. Aun así, el único de los supervisores con dotes artísticas reparó en un detalle peculiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, los supervisores no contaban con la sutileza necesaria para un interrogatorio eficaz. En lugar de eso, la mayoría de los extraños prisioneros acabaron apaleados hasta la muerte. Aun así, el único de los supervisores con dotes artísticas reparó en un detalle peculiar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}残念ながら、ある種の学識を持った労働収容所の監視役はあまり多くはなかった...ほとんどの' 奇妙な' 囚人は、尋問中に殴り殺されてしまった。しかし、そんな中、芸術的な才能を持つ監視役の一人が、珍しいことに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}残念ながら、ある種の学識を持った労働収容所の監視役はあまり多くはなかった...ほとんどの' 奇妙な' 囚人は、尋問中に殴り殺されてしまった。しかし、そんな中、芸術的な才能を持つ監視役の一人が、あることに気づいた。{/n}
{n}残念ながら、ある種の学識を持った労働収容所の監視役はあまり多くはなかった...ほとんどの' 奇妙な' 囚人は、尋問中に殴り殺されてしまった。しかし、そんな中、芸術的な才能を持つ監視役の一人が、あることに気づいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malheureusement, trop peu de contremaîtres ont un degré d'instruction suffisant... La plupart des détenus « étranges » sont tout simplement battus à mort lors des interrogatoires. Cela étant, l'un des contremaîtres ayant quelque don artistique, remarque quelque chose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malheureusement, trop peu de contremaîtres ont un degré d'instruction suffisant... La plupart des détenus « étranges » sont tout simplement battus à mort lors des interrogatoires. Cela étant, l'un des contremaîtres ayant quelque don artistique, remarque quelque chose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leider war das Interesse einer gezielten Untersuchung unter den Aufsehern eher gering ... die meisten merkwürdigen Gefangenen wurde im Lauf der Verhöre einfach totgeprügelt. Lediglich einer der Aufseher, der eine künstlerische Ader besaß, bemerkte etwas Ungewöhnliches.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leider war das Interesse einer gezielten Untersuchung unter den Aufsehern eher gering ... die meisten merkwürdigen Gefangenen wurde im Lauf der Verhöre einfach totgeprügelt. Lediglich einer der Aufseher, der eine künstlerische Ader besaß, bemerkte etwas Ungewöhnliches.{/n}

{n}Bedauerlicherweise gab es unter den Wärtern des Zwangsarbeiterlagers nur wenige, die zumindest ein klein wenig gelehrt waren. Die meisten der 'merkwürdigen' Gefangenen wurden während des Verhörs schlicht totgeprügelt. Einer der Wärter aber, der eine künstlerische Ader besaß, bemerkte etwas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki tahsilatlı sorgulama anlayışı, gözetmenlerde pek bulunmuyordu. Tuhaf hükümlülerin çoğu, sorguları sırasında ölesiye dövülmüştü. Ancak sıra dışı bir detay, sanata yatkın gözetmenlerden biri sayesinde tespit edilebildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, the spirit of educated enquiry was in limited supply among the overseers — most of the strange prisoners were simply beaten to death during their interrogations. But one of the overseers, who possessed a gift for the artistic, did notice something unusual.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ne yazık ki tahsilatlı sorgulama anlayışı, gözetmenlerde pek bulunmuyordu. Tuhaf hükümlülerin çoğu, sorguları sırasında ölesiye dövülmüştü. Ancak sıra dışı bir detay, sanata yatkın gözetmenlerden biri sayesinde tespit edilebildi.{/n}
